segments.text: I'm looking into a kitchen that feels strangely suspended in time.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman at the sink is diligently polishing a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the faucet is fully open, and water is continuously flowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink basin is completely full and overflowing onto the counter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's forming a significant puddle on the floor where she stands.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm surprised that she doesn't seem to notice the rising water at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is completely submerged in the growing pool of water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I really worry about her slipping on that wet floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This constant stream of water feels like such a waste.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is already streaming down the cabinet doors, causing damage.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how long it will take for her to finally realize what is happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This situation is becoming increasingly precarious with every passing second.
segments.speaker: PAR
